title: Manage Sessions
description: Here you can see all devices and browsers where you are logged in. You can terminate individual sessions or log out from all devices at once.

securityTip.label: Security tip:
securityTip.text: If you see an unknown device, terminate the session immediately and change your password.

list.confirmTerminate: Are you sure you want to terminate this session?
list.confirmTerminateAll: Are you sure you want to terminate all other sessions?

error: Error loading sessions. Please try again.
